entry.string: The Sniffer module is a utility module used for browser detection. For best results, the Sniffer module should be used in conjunction with the Stats module.
entry.translation: Zee Sneeffffer mudoole-a is a uteelity mudoole-a used fur brooser detecshun. Fur best resoolts, zee Sneeffffer mudoole-a shuoold be-a used in cunjooncshun veet zee Stets mudoole-a.

entry.string: The sniffer module will automatically detect a visitors OS and browser.
entry.translation: Zee sneeffffer mudoole-a veell ootumeteecelly detect a feesiturs OoS und brooser. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: There are no included blocks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet thees mudoole-a.

entry.string: There are no included hooks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks veet thees mudoole-a.
